Reported to House by House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.  Report No: 98-154 (Part I).
Reported to House by House Committee on Energy and Commerce. Report No: 98-154 (Part II).
Placed on Union Calendar No: 128.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Considered by House Unifinished Business Vote Postponed Until May 24, 1983.
Passed House by Yea-Nay Vote: 372 - 48 (Record Vote No: 134).
Laid on Table in House by Voice Vote.
Other Measure S.967 Passed House in Lieu.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Independent Safety Board Act of 1974 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1984, 1985, and 1986, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Independent Safety Board Act of 1974 to authorize appropriations for the National Transportation Safety Board for FY 1984 through 1986.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Independent Safety Board Act of 1974 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1984, 1985, and 1986, and for other purposes.
